page.title: 09The Voe Cubs.
page.content: Boys aged between 8 and 10.5 years may join the Voe Cubs.This group meets in the hall on Thursday night from 5.00pm_6.15pm. The first few weeks are for a trial period to see whether or not you want to join.If you decide to join you must make a promise to do your duty to God and the Queen,think of others before yourself and keep the Cub Scout law. The Cub Scout law is to help others before yourself and do a good deed every day. If you join the Cubs you can go camping,study nature and do simple cooking.You can also compete against other Shetland Cubs in five a side football and in a swimming gala. When you are 10.5 years old and are too old for Cubs you can join the Scouts in Brae.
